publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5169.1 Colin Fox: Christmas Day and New Year’s Day Trading (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5169) in the name of Karen Whitefield, insert at end "and, in so doing, recognises that both days are special and are defined public holidays and should be treated in exactly the same way." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
